section.name: Prerequisites
section.p: JDK, TOMCAT or another servlet container. Refer to these packages for installation instructions.

section.name: Related components
section.p: JES resolves CEA applications to CEA servers by querying an Astrogrid REGISTRY. JES needs to be configured to know the endpoint of a registry.

dl.dd: Install the jes WAR file to your servlet container in the usual manner
